title: Fragment of Darkness
description: Fragment of Darkness is a sequel to my successful book “Crown of Darkness”, which should be read first for the Fragment of Darkness to make any sense to you.It tells the story of how even the smallest fragment from the original Crown can still cause utter chaos. Until the curse is lifted completely, in the correct manner.Once again a lot of blood is spilt, lives are lost some in the most horrific ways. Many twists and turns will keep you on guessing until you reach the final conclusion.
author: Jeffery P. Coit
